compliance_assessment.framework_description: International standard for information security management systems (ISMS) focusing on risk management and control implementation.

requirements.requirement: Implement technical safeguards for data confidentiality, integrity, and availability
requirements.evidence: Data encryption (at rest/in transit) and cryptographic signing are planned
recommendations: Prioritize encryption implementation for database secrets
Add HMAC verification for deployment instruction signing

gaps: Role-based access controls not yet implemented
recommendations: Enforce least-privilege principles for deployment credentials

remediation_plan: Deploy database encryption and access controls by Q4 2025
